ffmpegPrefsIni:
[Version]
Version=4

[WebM HD 3600 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f webm -vcodec libvpx -quality {quality} -bufsize 6400k -b:v 3200k -crf  10 -cpu-used {cpu-used} {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -acodec libvorbis -ab 128k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=1280
maxHeight=720
MimeType=video/webm
Ext=.webm
Delay=2000

[WebM High 1800 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f webm -vcodec libvpx -quality {quality} -bufsize 3200k -b:v 1600k -crf  15 -cpu-used {cpu-used} {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -acodec libvorbis -ab 96k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=720
maxHeight=576
MimeType=video/webm
Ext=.webm
Delay=2000

[WebM Audio 128 kbit]

MimeType=audio/webm
ext=.webm

[Flash HD 3600 kbit]

Ext=.flv

[Flash Mid 1200 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f flv -vcodec libx264 -bufsize 2000k -maxrate 1000k -crf 23 -g 50 {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -preset {vpreset} -tune film -vprofile main -level 30 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 64k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=640
maxHeight=360
MimeType=video/x-flv
Ext=.flv

[Flash Low 800 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f flv -vcodec libx264 -bufsize 1400k -maxrate 700k -crf 24 -g 50 {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -preset {vpreset} -tune film -vprofile baseline -level 30 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 48k -ar 44100 -ac 1 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=512
maxHeight=288
MimeType=video/x-flv
Ext=.flv

[Flash Lowest 400 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f flv -vcodec libx264 -bufsize 600k -maxrate 300k -crf 25 -g 50 {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -preset {vpreset} -tune film -vprofile baseline -level 30 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 32k -ar 32000 -ac 1 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=480
maxHeight=270
MimeType=video/x-flv
Ext=.flv

[Flash Audio 128 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1M -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -f flv -vn -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -y -threads {threads} "{outfile}"
MimeType=audio/x-flv
ext=.flv

[TS HD 3600 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f mpegts -pat_period 0.2 -vcodec libx264 -bufsize 6400k -maxrate 3200k -crf 20 -g 50 {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -preset {vpreset} -tune film -vprofile main -level 30 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 128k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=1280
maxHeight=720
MimeType=video/mpeg
Ext=.ts

[TS High 1800 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f mpegts -pat_period 0.2 -vcodec libx264 -bufsize 3200k -maxrate 1600k -crf 22 -g 50 {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -preset {vpreset} -tune film -vprofile main -level 30 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 96k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=720
maxHeight=576
MimeType=video/mpeg
Ext=.ts

[TS Mid 1200 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f mpegts -pat_period 0.2 -vcodec libx264 -bufsize 2000k -maxrate 1000k -crf 23 -g 50 {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -preset {vpreset} -tune film -vprofile main -level 30 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 64k -ar 44100 -ac 2 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"
maxWidth=640
maxHeight=360
MimeType=video/mpeg
Ext=.ts

maxWidth=512

[TS Lowest 400 kbit]
Cmd=-analyzeduration 1500k -threads {threads} {offset} {realtime} -i "{infile}" -threads {threads} -f mpegts -pat_period 0.2 -vcodec libx264 -bufsize 600k -maxrate 300k -crf 25 -g 50 {framerate} -map 0:0 -map 0:1 -vf "yadif=0:-1:1, scale={scalex}:{scaley}" -preset {vpreset} -tune film -vprofile baseline -level 30 -acodec libmp3lame -ab 32k -ar 32000 -ac 1 -async 1 -y "{outfile}"

[TS Audio 128 kbit]

4=1280
